CompactLayoutItemInfo.name: CompactLayoutItemInfo
CompactLayoutItemInfo.description: Represents a field selected for a compact layout, and the order of that field in the compact layout.

CompactLayoutInfo.description: The compact layout associated with this CompactLayoutItemInfo.

CompactLayoutInfoId.description: ID of the compact layout associated with this field.

DurableId.description: This field reserved for future use. Do not use.

FieldDefinition.description: Required. The definition of this field.

SortOrder.description: The order of the field in the compact layout. 1 is first.
